items.sentence: You know that I'm still planning on joining the team, don't you?
It's good that you've come. What would we have done without you?
I have no reason to believe Tom won't do what I asked him to do.
I can't believe you really sold that junk for such a high price.
Tom Jackson is a very famous person in this part of the country.
I suggest that you keep your opinions to yourselves from now on.
I want to thank everyone on the search team who helped find Tom.
Tom and Mary blamed each other for the failure of their project.
Tom wanted to buy those sunglasses, but they were too expensive.
Our college won't admit Tom until he meets all the requirements.
